description: The JSON schema for a conformant GS1 resolver description file to be placed at /.well-known/gs1Resolver

resolverRoot.description: The root URL of the resolver

namespace.description: A namespace URI recognised by the resolver

prefix.description: The prefix assigned to this URI for use in CURIEs, including the colon

linkTypeDefaultCanBeAll.description: Boolean flag stating whether the resolver supports the option to make 'all' the default linkType.

supportsSemanticInterpretation.description: Boolean flag stating whether the resolver provides a semantic interpretation of request URIs

validatesAIcombinations.description: Boolean flag stating whether the resolver validates the combination of AIs according to the GS1 General Specifications

supportedContextValuesEnumerated.description: Enumeated list of values for context supported by this resolver

supportedContextValuesExternal.description: External lists of supported values for context recognised by this resolver

nameOfList.description: The name of the list of values

url.description: The URL of the external list

supportsLanguageVariants.description: A Boolean value to declare that the resolver may offer different redirections *or content) based on the user language

contact.description: Contact details for the resolver operator, uses VCard

hasAddress.description: Address info for the resolver operator

extensionProfile.description: A link to a document that describes any extended key=value pairs supported by the resolver and/or an additional supported compression/decompression capability

dataDump.description: The URL of a complete set of GS1 Digital Link URIs and their associated links available from this resolver

supportedPrimaryKeys.description: An array of primary keys supported by the resolver, provided as their numeric AI. The value 'all' indicates that all GS1 primary identification keys are supported
